EnhancedLetterhead.name: EnhancedLetterhead
EnhancedLetterhead.description: Represents an enhanced letterhead that can be associated with a Lightning email template that doesn’t use the Salesforce Merge Language (SML).

Description.description: Description of the contents of the header and footer.

LastReferencedDate.description: Date and time when this enhanced letterhead was last used.

LastViewedDate.description: Date and time when this enhanced letterhead was last viewed.

LetterheadFooter.description: The contents of the enhanced letterhead’s footer.

LetterheadHeader.description: The contents of the enhanced letterhead’s header.

Name.description: The name of the enhanced letterhead, such as Standard Company Letterhead.
